è§£æ³•1ï¼šåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’

æ€è·¯

  1. é¢„å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®å·¦å³ä¸¤ä¾§çš„æœ€å¤§é«˜åº¦
  2. æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®èƒ½æ¥çš„é›¨æ°´é‡ç”±ä¸¤ä¾§è¾ƒå°é«˜åº¦å†³å®š

å…³é”®æ­¥éª¤

  • ä»å·¦åˆ°å³è®¡ç®—å·¦ä¾§æœ€å¤§å€¼
  • ä»å³åˆ°å·¦è®¡ç®—å³ä¾§æœ€å¤§å€¼
  • è®¡ç®—æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„è´¡çŒ®å€¼
public int trap(int[] height) {
    if (height == null || height.length == 0) return 0;
    
    int n = height.length;
    int[] leftMax = new int[n];
    int[] rightMax = new int[n];
    int res = 0;
    
    leftMax[0] = height[0];
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        leftMax[i] = Math.max(leftMax[i-1], height[i]);
    }
    
    rightMax[n-1] = height[n-1];
    for (int i = n-2; i >= 0; i--) {
        rightMax[i] = Math.max(rightMax[i+1], height[i]);
    }
    
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        res += Math.min(leftMax[i], rightMax[i]) - height[i];
    }
    
    return res;
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šå•è°ƒæ ˆ

æ€è·¯

  1. ç»´æŠ¤é«˜åº¦é€’å‡çš„æ ˆ
  2. é‡åˆ°è¾ƒé«˜æŸ±å­æ—¶è®¡ç®—å‡¹æ§½é¢ç§¯
  3. é€šè¿‡æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ç¡®å®šè¾¹ç•Œ

ç‰¹ç‚¹

  • æŒ‰å±‚è®¡ç®—é›¨æ°´
  • é€‚åˆå¤„ç†å±€éƒ¨å‡¹æ§½
public int trap(int[] height) {
    Stack<Integer> stack = new Stack<>();
    int res = 0;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < height.length; i++) {
        while (!stack.isEmpty() && height[i] > height[stack.peek()]) {
            int top = stack.pop();
            if (stack.isEmpty()) break;
            
            int distance = i - stack.peek() - 1;
            int boundedHeight = Math.min(height[i], height[stack.peek()]) - height[top];
            res += distance * boundedHeight;
        }
        stack.push(i);
    }
    
    return res;
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)

è§£æ³•3ï¼šåŒæŒ‡é’ˆ

æ€è·¯

  1. å·¦å³æŒ‡é’ˆå‘ä¸­é—´ç§»åŠ¨
  2. ç»´æŠ¤å·¦å³æœ€å¤§å€¼
  3. æ ¹æ®è¾ƒå°è¾¹è®¡ç®—æ°´é‡

ä¼˜åŒ–ç‚¹

  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(1)
  • å•æ¬¡éå†
public int trap(int[] height) {
    int left = 0, right = height.length - 1;
    int leftMax = 0, rightMax = 0;
    int res = 0;
    
    while (left < right) {
        if (height[left] < height[right]) {
            if (height[left] >= leftMax) {
                leftMax = height[left];
            } else {
                res += leftMax - height[left];
            }
            left++;
        } else {
            if (height[right] >= rightMax) {
                rightMax = height[right];
            } else {
                res += rightMax - height[right];
            }
            right--;
        }
    }
    
    return res;
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Solution solution = new Solution();
    
    // æ ‡å‡†æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹
    int[] height1 = {0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1};
    System.out.println(solution.trap(height1)); // 6
    
    // è¾¹ç•Œæµ‹è¯•
    int[] height2 = {4,2,0,3,2,5};
    System.out.println(solution.trap(height2)); // 9
    
    // æ— é›¨æ°´æƒ…å†µ
    int[] height3 = {1,2,3,4,5};
    System.out.println(solution.trap(height3)); // 0
}

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ª n x n çš„çŸ©é˜µ isConnectedï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ isConnected[i][j] = 1 è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ i ä¸ªåŸå¸‚å’Œç¬¬ j ä¸ªåŸå¸‚ç›´æ¥ç›¸è¿ï¼Œ0 è¡¨ç¤ºä¸ç›¸è¿ã€‚çœä»½æ˜¯ä¸€ç»„ç›´æ¥æˆ–é—´æ¥ç›¸è¿çš„åŸå¸‚é›†åˆï¼Œæ±‚çŸ©é˜µä¸­çœä»½çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚

è§£æ³•1ï¼šæ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢(DFS)

æ€è·¯

  1. ä½¿ç”¨è®¿é—®æ•°ç»„æ ‡è®°å·²è®¿é—®åŸå¸‚
  2. å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªæœªè®¿é—®åŸå¸‚è¿›è¡ŒDFS
  3. é€šè¿‡çŸ©é˜µé€’å½’è®¿é—®ç›¸è¿åŸå¸‚
class Solution {
    public int findCircleNum(int[][] isConnected) {
        int n = isConnected.length;
        boolean[] visited = new boolean[n];
        int count = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (!visited[i]) {
                dfs(isConnected, visited, i);
                count++;
            }
        }
        return count;
    }
    
    private void dfs(int[][] matrix, boolean[] visited, int i) {
        for (int j = 0; j < matrix.length; j++) {
            if (matrix[i][j] == 1 && !visited[j]) {
                visited[j] = true;
                dfs(matrix, visited, j);
            }
        }
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nÂ²)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šå¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢(BFS)

æ€è·¯

  1. ä½¿ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—å®ç°BFSéå†
  2. æ¯æ¬¡å‡ºé˜Ÿæ—¶è®¿é—®æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸è¿åŸå¸‚
  3. ç»Ÿè®¡è¿é€šåˆ†é‡æ•°é‡
class Solution {
    public int findCircleNum(int[][] isConnected) {
        int n = isConnected.length;
        boolean[] visited = new boolean[n];
        int count = 0;
        Queue<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (!visited[i]) {
                queue.offer(i);
                while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
                    int city = queue.poll();
                    visited[city] = true;
                    for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
                        if (isConnected[city][j] == 1 && !visited[j]) {
                            queue.offer(j);
                        }
                    }
                }
                count++;
            }
        }
        return count;
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nÂ²)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)

è§£æ³•3ï¼šå¹¶æŸ¥é›†(Union-Find)

æ€è·¯

  1. åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¯ä¸ªåŸå¸‚ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹é›†åˆ
  2. åˆå¹¶ç›¸è¿åŸå¸‚
  3. ç»Ÿè®¡æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡
class Solution {
    public int findCircleNum(int[][] isConnected) {
        int n = isConnected.length;
        int[] parent = new int[n];
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) parent[i] = i;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
                if (isConnected[i][j] == 1) {
                    union(parent, i, j);
                }
            }
        }
        
        int count = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (parent[i] == i) count++;
        }
        return count;
    }
    
    private void union(int[] parent, int i, int j) {
        parent[find(parent, i)] = find(parent, j);
    }
    
    private int find(int[] parent, int i) {
        if (parent[i] != i) {
            parent[i] = find(parent, parent[i]);
        }
        return parent[i];
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nÂ² Î±(n))ï¼ŒÎ±ä¸ºé˜¿å…‹æ›¼åå‡½æ•°
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Solution solution = new Solution();
    
    // æ ‡å‡†æµ‹è¯•
    int[][] test1 = {{1,1,0},{1,1,0},{0,0,1}};
    System.out.println(solution.findCircleNum(test1)); // 2
    
    // å…¨è¿é€š
    int[][] test2 = {{1,1,1},{1,1,1},{1,1,1}};
    System.out.println(solution.findCircleNum(test2)); // 1
    
    // å…¨ä¸è¿é€š
    int[][] test3 = {{1,0,0},{0,1,0},{0,0,1}};
    System.out.println(solution.findCircleNum(test3)); // 3
}

ä¸åŒè§£æ³•çš„é€‰æ‹©å»ºè®®

å¸¸è§è¯¯åŒºæé†’

  • æ¯åˆ—ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹å‡åºæ’åˆ—
  • æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ äº’ä¸ç›¸åŒ

è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªç®—æ³•æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´  x çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œè¿”å›å…¶è¡Œå·å’Œåˆ—å·ï¼ˆä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼‰ã€‚è¦æ±‚æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ O(n+m)ï¼Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ O(1)ã€‚

æ€è·¯

  1. ä»çŸ©é˜µå³ä¸Šè§’å¼€å§‹æŸ¥æ‰¾
  2. å¦‚æœå½“å‰å…ƒç´ å¤§äºxï¼Œå‘å·¦ç§»åŠ¨
  3. å¦‚æœå½“å‰å…ƒç´ å°äºxï¼Œå‘ä¸‹ç§»åŠ¨
  4. ç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡æˆ–è¶Šç•Œ
public int[] findElement(int[][] mat, int n, int m, int x) {
    int row = 0, col = m - 1; // ä»å³ä¸Šè§’å¼€å§‹
    
    while (row < n && col >= 0) {
        if (mat[row][col] == x) {
            return new int[]{row, col};
        } else if (mat[row][col] > x) {
            col--; // å‘å·¦ç§»åŠ¨
        } else {
            row++; // å‘ä¸‹ç§»åŠ¨
        }
    }
    return new int[]{-1, -1}; // æœªæ‰¾åˆ°
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n+m)ï¼Œæœ€å¤šç§»åŠ¨n+mæ¬¡
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šé€è¡ŒäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾

æ€è·¯

  1. éå†æ¯ä¸€è¡Œ
  2. å¯¹æ¯è¡Œè¿›è¡ŒäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾
  3. æ‰¾åˆ°å³è¿”å›ä½ç½®
public int[] findElement(int[][] mat, int n, int m, int x) {
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int left = 0, right = m - 1;
        while (left <= right) {
            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
            if (mat[i][mid] == x) {
                return new int[]{i, mid};
            } else if (mat[i][mid] < x) {
                left = mid + 1;
            } else {
                right = mid - 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return new int[]{-1, -1};
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n log m)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)

è§£æ³•3ï¼šåˆ†æ²»æ³•ï¼ˆé’ˆå¯¹æ›´å¤§çŸ©é˜µï¼‰

æ€è·¯

  1. å°†çŸ©é˜µåˆ†ä¸ºå››ä¸ªè±¡é™
  2. æ ¹æ®xä¸ä¸­é—´å€¼çš„æ¯”è¾ƒå†³å®šæœç´¢èŒƒå›´
  3. é€’å½’æœç´¢å¯èƒ½åŒºåŸŸ
public int[] findElement(int[][] mat, int n, int m, int x) {
    return search(mat, 0, n-1, 0, m-1, x);
}

private int[] search(int[][] mat, int rowStart, int rowEnd, int colStart, int colEnd, int x) {
    if (rowStart > rowEnd || colStart > colEnd) return new int[]{-1, -1};
    
    int rowMid = rowStart + (rowEnd - rowStart)/2;
    int colMid = colStart + (colEnd - colStart)/2;
    
    if (mat[rowMid][colMid] == x) {
        return new int[]{rowMid, colMid};
    } else if (mat[rowMid][colMid] > x) {
        int[] res = search(mat, rowStart, rowMid-1, colStart, colEnd, x);
        if (res[0] == -1) {
            return search(mat, rowMid, rowEnd, colStart, colMid-1, x);
        }
        return res;
    } else {
        int[] res = search(mat, rowMid+1, rowEnd, colStart, colEnd, x);
        if (res[0] == -1) {
            return search(mat, rowStart, rowMid, colMid+1, colEnd, x);
        }
        return res;
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(log(nm))
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(log(n+m))ï¼ˆé€’å½’æ ˆï¼‰

æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Solution solution = new Solution();
    
    // æ ‡å‡†æµ‹è¯•
    int[][] mat1 = {
        {1, 4, 7},
        {2, 5, 8},
        {3, 6, 9}
    };
    System.out.println(Arrays.toString(solution.findElement(mat1, 3, 3, 5))); // [1, 1]
    
    // è¾¹ç•Œæµ‹è¯•
    int[][] mat2 = {
        {1, 3, 5},
        {7, 9, 11}
    };
    System.out.println(Arrays.toString(solution.findElement(mat2, 2, 3, 11))); // [1, 2]
    
    // æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æµ‹è¯•
    System.out.println(Arrays.toString(solution.findElement(mat1, 3, 3, 10))); // [-1, -1]
}

è§£æ³•åˆ†æ

  1. æ„å»ºèœå•æ ‘ç»“æ„ï¼šä½¿ç”¨HashMapå»ºç«‹çˆ¶èœå•IDåˆ°å­èœå•åˆ—è¡¨çš„æ˜ å°„
  2. é€’å½’æ‰“å°ï¼šä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹(pid=0)å¼€å§‹ï¼Œé€’å½’æ‰“å°æ¯ä¸ªèœå•åŠå…¶å­èœå•
  3. å±‚çº§ç¼©è¿›ï¼šé€šè¿‡é€’å½’æ·±åº¦æ§åˆ¶"+"çš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œå®ç°å±‚çº§ç¼©è¿›æ•ˆæœ

å…³é”®æ­¥éª¤

  1. æ•°æ®é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼šå°†èœå•é¡¹æŒ‰çˆ¶IDåˆ†ç»„å­˜å‚¨
  2. é€’å½’æ‰“å°ï¼šæ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†èœå•æ ‘

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„å®ç°ä»£ç 

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

public class MenuPrinter {
    
    static class Menu {
        int id;
        String text;
        int parentId;

        public Menu(int id, String text, int parentId) {
            this.id = id;
            this.text = text;
            this.parentId = parentId;
        }
    }

    public static void printMenuHierarchy(List<Menu> menus) {
        // 1. æ„å»ºèœå•æ ‘ï¼šçˆ¶ID -> å­èœå•åˆ—è¡¨
        Map<Integer, List<Menu>> menuTree = buildMenuTree(menus);
        
        // 2. ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹æ‰“å°ï¼ˆparentId=0ï¼‰
        printSubMenus(menuTree, 0, "");
    }

    private static Map<Integer, List<Menu>> buildMenuTree(List<Menu> menus) {
        Map<Integer, List<Menu>> tree = new HashMap<>();
        
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èœå•åˆ—è¡¨
        menus.forEach(menu -> {
            tree.putIfAbsent(menu.parentId, new ArrayList<>());
            tree.get(menu.parentId).add(menu);
        });
        
        return tree;
    }

    private static void printSubMenus(Map<Integer, List<Menu>> menuTree, 
                                     int parentId, String indent) {
        // è·å–å½“å‰çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­èœå•
        List<Menu> subMenus = menuTree.get(parentId);
        if (subMenus == null) return;

        // æ‰“å°å½“å‰å±‚çº§çš„èœå•
        for (Menu menu : subMenus) {
            System.out.println(indent + menu.text);
            // é€’å½’æ‰“å°å­èœå•ï¼Œç¼©è¿›å¢åŠ 
            printSubMenus(menuTree, menu.id, indent + "+");
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<Menu> menus = new ArrayList<>();
        menus.add(new Menu(1, "A", 0));
        menus.add(new Menu(2, "B", 0));
        menus.add(new Menu(3, "C", 1));
        menus.add(new Menu(4, "D", 2));
        menus.add(new Menu(5, "E", 4));
        menus.add(new Menu(6, "F", 5));
        menus.add(new Menu(7, "G", 3));
        menus.add(new Menu(8, "H", 2));
        menus.add(new Menu(9, "J", 1));

        printMenuHierarchy(menus);
    }
}

// æµ‹è¯•ç©ºèœå•
List<Menu> emptyMenus = new ArrayList<>();
printMenuHierarchy(emptyMenus);  // åº”æ— è¾“å‡º

// æµ‹è¯•å•å±‚èœå•
List<Menu> singleLevel = new ArrayList<>();
singleLevel.add(new Menu(1, "Root1", 0));
singleLevel.add(new Menu(2, "Root2", 0));
printMenuHierarchy(singleLevel);
// é¢„æœŸè¾“å‡º:
// Root1
// Root2

// æµ‹è¯•æ·±å±‚çº§èœå•

deepHierarchy.add(new Menu(1, "A", 0));
deepHierarchy.add(new Menu(2, "B", 1));
deepHierarchy.add(new Menu(3, "C", 2));
deepHierarchy.add(new Menu(4, "D", 3));
printMenuHierarchy(deepHierarchy);
// é¢„æœŸè¾“å‡º:
// A
// +B
// ++C
// +++D

  3. å›¾å½¢åŒ–è¾“å‡ºï¼šå¯ä»¥æ‰©å±•ä¸ºç”Ÿæˆæ ‘å½¢ç»“æ„çš„ASCIIè‰ºæœ¯æˆ–HTMLæ ¼å¼

è¿™ä¸ªè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ¸…æ™°ã€é«˜æ•ˆåœ°è§£å†³äº†èœå•å±‚çº§æ‰“å°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä»£ç ç»“æ„è‰¯å¥½ï¼Œæ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤å’Œæ‰©å±•ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ˆå®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„pushå’Œpopæ“ä½œï¼Œè¦æ±‚ï¼š

  • æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦éƒ½æ˜¯O(1)

è§£æ³•1ï¼šåŒæ ˆå€’æ¢æ³•ï¼ˆåŸºç¡€ç‰ˆï¼‰

import java.util.Stack;

public class QueueWithTwoStacks {
    Stack<Integer> inStack = new Stack<>();
    Stack<Integer> outStack = new Stack<>();

    // æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)
    public void push(int node) {
        inStack.push(node);
    }

    // å¹³å‡æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)ï¼ˆæ‘Šè¿˜åˆ†æï¼‰
    public int pop() {
        if (outStack.isEmpty()) {
            while (!inStack.isEmpty()) {
                outStack.push(inStack.pop());
            }
        }
        return outStack.pop();
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ˆå­˜å‚¨å…ƒç´ ï¼‰
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š
    • pushæ“ä½œï¼šO(1)
    • popæ“ä½œï¼šå¹³å‡O(1)ï¼ˆæœ€åæƒ…å†µO(n)ï¼Œä½†æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æœ€å¤šè¢«ç§»åŠ¨ä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼‰

ä¼˜åŒ–è¯´æ˜

  1. å°†æ ˆé‡å‘½åä¸ºæ›´å…·è¯­ä¹‰åŒ–çš„inStackå’ŒoutStack
  2. é‡‡ç”¨æƒ°æ€§è½¬ç§»ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œåªæœ‰åœ¨outStackä¸ºç©ºæ—¶æ‰è¿›è¡Œå…ƒç´ è½¬ç§»
  3. é€šè¿‡æ‘Šè¿˜åˆ†æï¼Œpopæ“ä½œçš„å¹³å‡æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(1)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šæ”¹è¿›ç‰ˆï¼ˆå‡å°‘å…ƒç´ ç§»åŠ¨ï¼‰

import java.util.Stack;

public class OptimizedQueue {
    Stack<Integer> inputStack = new Stack<>();
    Stack<Integer> outputStack = new Stack<>();

    public void push(int node) {
        inputStack.push(node);
    }

    public int pop() {
        // åªæœ‰åœ¨è¾“å‡ºæ ˆä¸ºç©ºæ—¶æ‰è¿›è¡Œè½¬ç§»
        if (outputStack.isEmpty()) {
            transferElements();
        }
        return outputStack.pop();
    }

    private void transferElements() {
        while (!inputStack.isEmpty()) {
            outputStack.push(inputStack.pop());
        }
    }
}

æ”¹è¿›ç‚¹

  1. å°†å…ƒç´ è½¬ç§»é€»è¾‘æŠ½å–ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹æ–¹æ³•
  2. æ›´æ¸…æ™°çš„é€»è¾‘åˆ†ç¦»ï¼Œæé«˜ä»£ç å¯è¯»æ€§
  3. ä¿æŒç›¸åŒçš„æ€§èƒ½ç‰¹å¾ä½†æ›´æ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤

æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹

public static void main(String[] args) {
    QueueWithTwoStacks queue = new QueueWithTwoStacks();
    
    // æµ‹è¯•åŸºæœ¬åŠŸèƒ½
    queue.push(1);
    queue.push(2);
    queue.push(3);
    System.out.println(queue.pop()); // 1
    System.out.println(queue.pop()); // 2
    
    // æµ‹è¯•äº¤æ›¿push/pop
    queue.push(4);
    System.out.println(queue.pop()); // 3
    queue.push(5);
    System.out.println(queue.pop()); // 4
    System.out.println(queue.pop()); // 5
    
    // æµ‹è¯•è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶
    try {
        queue.pop(); // åº”è¯¥æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸æˆ–è¿”å›ç‰¹å®šå€¼
    } catch (Exception e) {
        System.out.println("é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©º");
    }
}

ä¸åŒå®ç°çš„é€‰æ‹©å»ºè®®

  2. å®é™…åº”ç”¨ï¼šæ”¹è¿›ç‰ˆï¼ˆä»£ç æ›´æ¸…æ™°ï¼Œæ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤ï¼‰

å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜è§£ç­”

Q: ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆpopæ“ä½œçš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯O(1)ï¼Ÿ A: è™½ç„¶æœ€åæƒ…å†µä¸‹éœ€è¦O(n)æ—¶é—´è½¬ç§»å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä½†æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æœ€å¤šè¢«è½¬ç§»ä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼ˆä»inStackåˆ°outStackä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œç„¶åè¢«popä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¹³å‡æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(1)ã€‚

Q: å¦‚ä½•ä¿è¯çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ï¼Ÿ A: å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šæ·»åŠ synchronizedå…³é”®å­—ï¼Œæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ConcurrentStackç­‰çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚

Q: è¿™ç§å®ç°çš„å±€é™æ€§æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ A: ä¸é€‚åˆéœ€è¦é¢‘ç¹éšæœºè®¿é—®çš„åœºæ™¯ï¼Œä¸”è¿ç»­pop/pushæ“ä½œå¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´æ€§èƒ½æ³¢åŠ¨ã€‚

è¿™ä¸ªå®ç°æ»¡è¶³äº†é¢˜ç›®æ‰€æœ‰è¦æ±‚ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›äº†æ¸…æ™°çš„ä»£ç ç»“æ„å’Œåˆç†çš„æ€§èƒ½ç‰¹å¾ã€‚

å¤šçº¿ç¨‹äº¤æ›¿æ‰“å°ABCè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ

é¢˜ç›®æè¿°

åˆ›å»ºä¸‰ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹Aã€Bã€Cï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ‰“å°å­—æ¯Aã€Bã€Cå„10æ¬¡ï¼Œè¦æ±‚ä¸‰ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹äº¤æ›¿æ‰§è¡Œï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ABCABC...çš„é¡ºåºæ‰“å°ã€‚

è§£æ³•1ï¼šä¿¡å·é‡(Semaphore)å®ç°

å®ç°æ€è·¯ ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‰ä¸ªä¿¡å·é‡æ§åˆ¶çº¿ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºï¼Œå½¢æˆå¾ªç¯ä¾èµ–é“¾ï¼š

  • çº¿ç¨‹Aéœ€è¦è·å–ä¿¡å·é‡Aåæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œç„¶åé‡Šæ”¾ä¿¡å·é‡B
  • çº¿ç¨‹Béœ€è¦è·å–ä¿¡å·é‡Båæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œç„¶åé‡Šæ”¾ä¿¡å·é‡C
  • çº¿ç¨‹Céœ€è¦è·å–ä¿¡å·é‡Cåæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œç„¶åé‡Šæ”¾ä¿¡å·é‡A
import java.util.concurrent.Semaphore;

public class ABCSemaphore {
    private static Semaphore semA = new Semaphore(1);
    private static Semaphore semB = new Semaphore(0);
    private static Semaphore semC = new Semaphore(0);

    static class PrintThread extends Thread {
        private Semaphore current;
        private Semaphore next;
        private String content;
        private int count;

        public PrintThread(Semaphore current, Semaphore next, String content, int count) {
            this.current = current;
            this.next = next;
            this.content = content;
            this.count = count;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            try {
                for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                    current.acquire();
                    System.out.print(content);
                    next.release();
                }
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        new PrintThread(semA, semB, "A", 10).start();
        new PrintThread(semB, semC, "B", 10).start();
        new PrintThread(semC, semA, "C", 10).start();
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šåŒæ­¥é”(synchronized)å®ç°

å®ç°æ€è·¯ ä½¿ç”¨å¯¹è±¡é”å’Œwait/notifyæœºåˆ¶æ§åˆ¶æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºï¼š

  • æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹éœ€è¦è·å–å‰é©±çº¿ç¨‹çš„é”å’Œè‡ªèº«é”
  • æ‰“å°åå”¤é†’ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œè‡ªèº«è¿›å…¥ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€
public class ABCSynchronized {
    private static Object lockA = new Object();
    private static Object lockB = new Object();
    private static Object lockC = new Object();

    static class PrintThread implements Runnable {
        private Object prevLock;
        private Object selfLock;
        private String content;
        private int count;

        public PrintThread(Object prevLock, Object selfLock, String content, int count) {
            this.prevLock = prevLock;
            this.selfLock = selfLock;
            this.content = content;
            this.count = count;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (count > 0) {
                synchronized (prevLock) {
                    synchronized (selfLock) {
                        System.out.print(content);
                        count--;
                        selfLock.notifyAll();
                    }
                    try {
                        if (count == 0) {
                            prevLock.notifyAll();
                        } else {
                            prevLock.wait();
                        }
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
        new Thread(new PrintThread(lockC, lockA, "A", 10)).start();
        Thread.sleep(10);
        new Thread(new PrintThread(lockA, lockB, "B", 10)).start();
        Thread.sleep(10);
        new Thread(new PrintThread(lockB, lockC, "C", 10)).start();
    }
}

è§£æ³•3ï¼šå¯é‡å…¥é”(ReentrantLock)å®ç°

å®ç°æ€è·¯ ä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡å’Œæ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼š

  • é€šè¿‡stateå˜é‡æ§åˆ¶å½“å‰åº”è¯¥æ‰§è¡Œçš„çº¿ç¨‹
  • ä½¿ç”¨whileå¾ªç¯é¿å…è™šå‡å”¤é†’
import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;

public class ABCReentrantLock {
    private static Lock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    private static int state = 0;

    static class PrintThread extends Thread {
        private String content;
        private int targetState;
        private int count;

        public PrintThread(String content, int targetState, int count) {
            this.content = content;
            this.targetState = targetState;
            this.count = count;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            for (int i = 0; i < count; ) {
                lock.lock();
                try {
                    while (state % 3 == targetState) {
                        System.out.print(content);
                        state++;
                        i++;
                    }
                } finally {
                    lock.unlock();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        new PrintThread("A", 0, 10).start();
        new PrintThread("B", 1, 10).start();
        new PrintThread("C", 2, 10).start();
    }
}

è§£æ³•4ï¼šLock+Conditionå®ç°

å®ç°æ€è·¯ ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åˆ›å»ºConditionæ¡ä»¶ï¼š

  • çº¿ç¨‹åœ¨ä¸ç¬¦åˆæ‰§è¡Œæ¡ä»¶æ—¶await
  • å‰é©±çº¿ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåsignalä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹
import java.util.concurrent.locks.*;

public class ABCCondition {
    private static Lock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    private static Condition conditionA = lock.newCondition();
    private static Condition conditionB = lock.newCondition();
    private static Condition conditionC = lock.newCondition();
    private static int state = 0;

    static class PrintThread extends Thread {
        private Condition current;
        private Condition next;
        private String content;
        private int targetState;
        private int count;

        public PrintThread(Condition current, Condition next, 
                         String content, int targetState, int count) {
            this.current = current;
            this.next = next;
            this.content = content;
            this.targetState = targetState;
            this.count = count;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            lock.lock();
            try {
                for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                    while (state % 3 != targetState) {
                        current.await();
                    }
                    System.out.print(content);
                    state++;
                    next.signal();
                }
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                lock.unlock();
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        new PrintThread(conditionA, conditionB, "A", 0, 10).start();
        new PrintThread(conditionB, conditionC, "B", 1, 10).start();
        new PrintThread(conditionC, conditionA, "C", 2, 10).start();
    }
}

æ–¹æ¡ˆå¯¹æ¯”

æ–¹æ¡ˆä¼˜ç‚¹ç¼ºç‚¹é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯
Semaphoreå®ç°ç®€å•ï¼Œé€»è¾‘æ¸…æ™°éœ€è¦å¤šä¸ªä¿¡å·é‡ç®€å•åŒæ­¥åœºæ™¯
SynchronizedJavaåŸç”Ÿæ”¯æŒéœ€è¦ç²¾ç»†æ§åˆ¶é”é¡ºåºåŸºç¡€åŒæ­¥éœ€æ±‚
ReentrantLockçµæ´»ï¼Œå¯ä¸­æ–­éœ€è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨é‡Šæ”¾é”å¤æ‚åŒæ­¥æ§åˆ¶
Conditionç²¾ç¡®æ§åˆ¶çº¿ç¨‹å”¤é†’å®ç°è¾ƒå¤æ‚éœ€è¦æ¡ä»¶ç­‰å¾…çš„åœºæ™¯

æœ€ä½³å®è·µå»ºè®®

  1. ç®€å•åœºæ™¯ä¼˜å…ˆè€ƒè™‘Semaphoreæ–¹æ¡ˆ
  2. éœ€è¦ç²¾ç¡®æ§åˆ¶æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨Lock+Condition
  3. ä¿æŒä»£ç ç®€æ´æ€§å’Œå¯è¯»æ€§

LRUç¼“å­˜å®ç°æ–¹æ¡ˆ

LRUç®—æ³•ç®€ä»‹

LRUï¼ˆLeast Recently Usedï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¸¸è§çš„ç¼“å­˜æ·˜æ±°ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šä¼˜å…ˆæ·˜æ±°æœ€è¿‘æœ€å°‘ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¿ç•™çƒ­ç‚¹æ•°æ®ã€‚

è§£æ³•1ï¼šåŒå‘é“¾è¡¨+å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

å®ç°æ€è·¯

  1. ä½¿ç”¨åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ç»´æŠ¤æ•°æ®è®¿é—®é¡ºåº
  2. ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨å®ç°O(1)æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦çš„æ•°æ®è®¿é—®
  3. é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨æ˜¯æœ€ä¹…æœªä½¿ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°¾éƒ¨æ˜¯æœ€è¿‘ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

public class LRUCache<K, V> {
    private final int capacity;
    private final Map<K, Node<K, V>> cache;
    private Node<K, V> head;
    private Node<K, V> tail;

    private static class Node<K, V> {
        K key;
        V value;
        Node<K, V> prev;
        Node<K, V> next;

        Node(K key, V value) {
            this.key = key;
            this.value = value;
        }
    }

    public LRUCache(int capacity) {
        this.capacity = capacity;
        this.cache = new HashMap<>();
    }

    public V get(K key) {
        Node<K, V> node = cache.get(key);
        if (node == null) return null;
        
        moveToTail(node);
        return node.value;
    }

    public void put(K key, V value) {
        Node<K, V> node = cache.get(key);
        
        if (node != null) {
            node.value = value;
            moveToTail(node);
        } else {
            node = new Node<>(key, value);
            cache.put(key, node);
            addToTail(node);
            
            if (cache.size() > capacity) {
                cache.remove(head.key);
                removeNode(head);
            }
        }
    }

    private void moveToTail(Node<K, V> node) {
        removeNode(node);
        addToTail(node);
    }

    private void removeNode(Node<K, V> node) {
        if (node.prev != null) {
            node.prev.next = node.next;
        } else {
            head = node.next;
        }
        
        if (node.next != null) {
            node.next.prev = node.prev;
        } else {
            tail = node.prev;
        }
    }

    private void addToTail(Node<K, V> node) {
        if (tail != null) {
            tail.next = node;
            node.prev = tail;
            node.next = null;
        }
        tail = node;
        
        if (head == null) {
            head = node;
        }
    }
}

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šgetå’Œputæ“ä½œå‡ä¸ºO(1)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(capacity)

è§£æ³•2ï¼šLinkedHashMapå®ç°

å®ç°æ€è·¯ åˆ©ç”¨Javaå†…ç½®çš„LinkedHashMapï¼Œå®ƒæœ¬èº«å°±ç»´æŠ¤äº†è®¿é—®é¡ºåº

import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
import java.util.Map;

public class LRUCache<K, V> extends LinkedHashMap<K, V> {
    private final int capacity;

    public LRUCache(int capacity) {
        super(capacity, 0.75f, true);
        this.capacity = capacity;
    }

    @Override
    protected boolean removeEldestEntry(Map.Entry<K, V> eldest) {
        return size() > capacity;
    }
}

  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(capacity)
